channel.title: How do i connect to the Server Status servers?
channel.description: It's been a long time since ive played moparscape, and ive completely forgotten how to actually play the Server Status servers (the ones where you dont have to download a client) so if anyone could please help me on what to do it would be much appriciated ;D

item.title: How do i connect to the Server Status servers?
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

Depends on which client you have. Some clients allow you to change it, other clients you will have to go into the coding files and change the default port (43594) to what ever port the server is wanting (5555, 7777, ect…)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i connect to the Server Status servers?

item.title: How do i connect to the Server Status servers?
item.dc:creator: @noexit noexit
item.description:
@noexit wrote:

yeah ive downloaded the client but where do i put the port in for the servers?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i connect to the Server Status servers?

item.title: How do i connect to the Server Status servers?
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

No idea what you’re talking about. You must download a client in order to play the new servers. You used to be able to play moparscape’s webclient, but that client is way out of date and will null on any server you play.

To get to the server status, go to this link: http://Moparscape.org/serverstatus.php Or just go to the forums home page, and there is a link for the server status page there also.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i connect to the Server Status servers?
